note: [Non-melanoma skin cancers](#dod:non-melanoma-skin-cancer) are excluded due to potentially incomplete records and inconsistent registry practices.
title: Share of new cancers caused by Helicobacter pylori bacteria
subtitle: The estimated share of all new [cancer](#dod:cancer) cases that are attributed to the bacterium [Helicobacter pylori](#dod:helicobacter-pylori). The bacteria can infect the stomach lining and is a key [risk factor](#dod:risk-factor) for the development of certain types of stomach cancer.
